lore: Skorpekh Destroyers favour overwhelming close-quarters violence to slaughter their victims. Though ungainly off the battlefield, in combat their tripod limbs allow them to pass through enemy lines in a madcap pirouette of slashing hyperphase blades, nigh on impossible to evade or parry.

faction: Whirling Onslaught: Each time a model in this unit makes a melee attack
you can ignore any or all modifiers to that attack’s Weapon Skill characteristic and/or that attack’s Hit roll.

otherAbilities.Plasmacyte:: Once per battle for each Plasmacyte this unit has, when this unit is selected to fight, you can use this ability. If you do, until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in this unit have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.
otherAbilities.Designer’s Note:: Place the relevant number of Plasmacyte tokens next to the unit, removing one each time this unit uses this ability.
